title: Trevor Noah Is BASED on COVID Vaccine? But Wrong About Gas Prices
description:
Trevor Noah gets one right on vaccines, but is horribly wrong on gas prices. We’ll explain why. Also, Twitter is “fact” checking the American Heart Association now. And why is the Oxford shooter a terrorist, but the Waukesha killer isn’t? #TrevorNoah #Oxford #Waukesha
